comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

(20 comments)

I have added my comments. Thanks!

Patch Set 1:

(1 comment)

Hi Geoffroy,

You're right. Dialog should be built in another project. Because we were really pressed for time (TDC) we decided to directly include it in the sources of the system-installer. I Think that now, we can separate the two projects.

Patch Set 1:

I made a package request for the dialog program. See here : https://bugs.tizen.org/jira/browse/TINF-640

subject: * eMMC detection * non executable permissions on installer.conf * redirect all escape keys and Ctrl-C to sigint_handler in system-installer * system-installer start at boot on tty2
commitMessage:
* eMMC detection
* non executable permissions on installer.conf
* redirect all escape keys and Ctrl-C to sigint_handler in system-installer
* system-installer start at boot on tty2

Signed-off-by: Guittet Thibault <thibault.guittet@open.eurogiciel.org>
